Лучая игра,, как мне кажется. Она не только развивает интеллект, но тут ещё и крутой режим кооператива, который позволяет играть с друзьями и не скучно проводить время.

Really Excellent!
Jogo simplesmente lindo... zerei em oito horas, sendo dessas 8, 7 foram seguidas sem parar pra quase nada. Recomendo pra todos que amam syfy, tecnologia, etc... 10/10
Sencillamente increible, buena historia, buenos puzles, buenos graficos, buen rendimiento (mi pc es una patata y va de fabula), divertido, original, vamos un juego obligatorio.

Très belle balade virtuel.

+ Gameplay parfait
+ Les portails
+ mode online

They didn't really Top Portal 1 but they did do every bit as good with 2.  Well worth picking up and playing. The Coop play was also excellent.  The workshop adds a nice additional touch.  There are some truly gifted level designers contributing and they help make this game even better.

Great game, got sucked into the story quickly and kept playing 'till the end, a few puzzles caught me on the way to the finish... like one that wasn't even a test but was in the middle of one of them.

Absolutely Amazing. Portal 1 Was A MUST HAVE, And Now Portal 2 Has Sucker Punched It In The Dick. This Game Deserves A Metal! OH WAIT. Portal 2 Was A Game Of The Year. Great Story, Great Soundtrack, Hilariously Fun Co-Op Mode, Amazing Map Maker, Steamworkshop, Everything Is Great!

PROS
-Great Storyline
-Beautiful Soundtrack
-Very Fun Co-Op
-Funny Dialogue 
-Memorable Characters
-Challenging (In The Good Way)
-Everything

10/10
Very fun and challenging game!
This is my favorite game. It's addicting and I recommend it to anyone and everyone.

Segunda parte de Portal que cuenta con novedosos y divertidos añadidos en los puzzles y que se centra un poco mas en la historia que en la primera parte, ademas incluye un modo cooperativo con el que poder pasartelo en grande con un amigo ademas de la cantidad de puzzles que puedes descargar de la comunidad u la posibilidad de crear tus propios puzzles (camaras) y compartirlos con los demás.
Joguei e terminei Portal 1, achei um dos melhores jogos já lançados. Recentemente comprei o Portal 2, um espetaculo! Jogo totalmente inteligente, com historia e diversão garantidas. Recomendo!!

It's not too hard and pretty fun to solve the puzzles.
Une histoire et de l'humour, que du bonheur ! :D
One of the best. Awkward use of new mechanics at the end, but the basic Portal mechanics can't be beat.

O primeiro jogo já era bom e agora este conseguiu superar todas as expectativas do primeiro, uma obra de arte em forma de jogo, e ficou ainda mais divertido por causa que nós também podemos criar os nossos próprios mapas de teste. Eu recomendo este jogo para todas as pessoas que gostam de jogos deste tipo e para as que não gostam também.

Je recommande très fortement ce jeu, je viens juste de finir la campagne en Solo mais je n'ai pas fait encore les coopération mais que dire, ce jeu et tout simplement sublime, avec un sénario qui tien bien la route. En espèrant une suite !

*****

This is how a sequel should be. It builds on the original without feeling rehashed.

Almost everything is amazing in Portal 2. Its got excellent story, wonderful puzzles, stunning graphics and great music. It's only an ending theme, but what an ending.

One of few drawbacks are that most achievements are grindy and filler, like hugging friends or winning rock paper scissors. 

My recommendation is to buy both games in a bundle and play the first one, then this.
El juego ta bien
Una gran continuacion de la saga Portal, en mi opinion uno de los mejores juegos de Puzzles que existe. Es una Obra maestra, y con la Workshop te da para unas largas hora de juego.
Es un gran juego, 100 por 100 recomendado a cualquiera, aparte una gran historia que personalmente me ha encantado, pero si vas a jugar a portal 2, juega antes sin falta el 1º ;-)

Una renovación del primer juego, muy mejorado. En este caso, no solo tenemos mejores y mas puzzles con nuevas mecánicas, sino además una trama interesante. Ya no se trata de tan solo GLaDOS; hay otra "inteligencia" (con carencia de inteligencia) artificial involucrada, pero cuyo poder no supera al de una patata.

9/10

I've only played one hour of this game and so far it's been very entertaining. The dialog and atmosphere have been great. I especially liked the moment [spoiler]GLADOS is turned back on. Her dialog is even better in Portal 2 than it was in Portal.[/spoiler]

One complaint I have is that level design feels too easy. I don't know if it's just because the game is easing me into or what. I played this game while intoxicated and was able to immediately solve what was presented to me.

So far works flawlessly on Linux.

Très bon jeu, mais peut mieux faire. :melon:
--------------------------------------
J'ai passé de très bonnes heures sur ce jeu, cependant, le fait de finir l'histoire aussi vite me pértube.
L'histoire est un mélange entre de l'action, de la stratégie/logique et une sorte d'aventure. Nous sommes réveiller par Wheatly, "Le gentil Nabot", comme il le dit si bien, alors qu'on était plongé en pleine criostase. Suite à un accident au sein des laboratoire, les deux personnages sont contrain de s'enfuir des abysses d'Aperture Science à l'aide du Portal Gun afin de finir sein et sauf. A un moment, ils rencontrent Caroline, ou plutôt "GlaDOS" qui est un ancien collègue au créateur "Cave Johnson" d'Aperture Science". En cherchant le module d'évacuation, Wheatly déclenche accidentellement la réactivation de GlaDOS, ce qui entraine Chell, de rester toute sa vie à faire des test, mais aussi elle devra subir toute sa vie la soumission de GlaDOS.
Des anciennes salles de test, aux très anciennes, et même aux nouvelles, il faudra faire preuve de logique et de patience pour réussir à échapper à GlaDOS, et même à Wheatly (Si vous jouer au jeun vous comprendrez pour quoi). Cependant, le jeu à une très mauvaise durée de jeu (J'ai fini le jeu en 2 heures), et pour cela, il ont essayer de se ratraper avec les salles de test comunautaires, et avec le très bon mode co-op.
L'histoire à un très bon sens, et peut en apprendre plus sur la vie des trois personnage.
Le jeu est de difficulté moyenne, mais faut quand même faire preuve d'une grande logique. Mais il offre un gameplay accesible à tous !

-------------------------------------------------------
Je recommande ce jeu à tout les joueurs de steam, qui aime les grand classique de Valve. Vivement leur prochaines opus !
Awesome

O único defeito desse jogo é a falta de continuação com um terceiro para a série. Uma obra de arte.

Oyunun mantığını kapan bir kişi bu oyunu olumsuz oylayamaz. Valve her zamanki gibi sıradışı bir oyun ile oyuncuları büyülüyor. Grafikler muhteşem, sistemi harika, hikayesi süper.. Oyunun çözümüne internetten bakmadan bitirmeye çalışmanızı şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum. Bir süre sonra "lan demek böyle oluyormuş helal ulan adamlar düşünmüş" moduna giriyorsunuz.

Verdiğiniz paraya değecek sayılı oyunlardan birisi.
A bit old by now but it is really a great game and it is a lot of fun playing by yourself or with friends. Can highly recommend it. :-)

Heureusement, la commu est là pour créer des niveaux supplémentaires et étendre la durée de vie à l'infini :D

I'm a first time portal player i have hurd of this game so much through social media and i was thinking can it keep up with all the hype that it had received over the years of release...... And so it did its a amazing game full of awesome puzzles that will take time to figure out and test your skills. Portal 2 will twist your knowledge of the laws of physics. I would define this game as a physics bending puzzle game with a well placed sense of humor that will provide a fun adventure for the weeks to come........
